name: Moto Offroad Simulator
description:
Welcome back champion!

We've already convinced ourselves that you're invincible, that's why we've prepared something special for you where you'll fight with yourself, trying to get new records.

Moto Offroad Simulator is a racing game and is what you searched for! At the wheel of a motocross you will have to go through the mud, do stunts in the mountains and all this without putting your life in danger.

This is why we have offered you equipment with a helmet and a special suit. Do you think you can get all the horse power out of the motorcycle ?
It might surprise you with its power. Have fun !
Game Features :
- 3 mountain motocross
- 15 levels
- Limited time for each mission
